:::Torca:::

Torca: This is my buddy Klant.  Ya see, i was walking down the halls 
recently when i came across a dying Alliance Bot.  I took the 
oppurtunity to shoot him, but he was tougher than i thought.  I 
opeded up my comm and NOBODY ANSWERED except for Klant.  Together we 
contained this bot's spark and we've been friends ever since.

had a few

friend?"

have heard
